column4: can anyone tell me how to remove a pkg but not the things that depend on it?
packages depend on other packages for functionality - so what you say in intrinsically impossible

- i agree :) I'm trying to remove a dhcp server that is a problem for me but there are other things on the system that require a DHCP server. I have one on the network and I want/need to use the other one
maybe you can find out what the other dhcp server does, disable the one installed by ubuntu through its configuration file, and start using the other one?
